directions: Combine water, chicken bouillon granules, minced onion, butter, celery flakes, parsley, salt, sage, and thyme in a microwave-safe 2-quart container. Heat in microwave oven on high until boiling, 2 to 3 minutes. Remove from microwave, stir rice into the liquid, and cover. Let rice stand until liquid is absorbed, 5 to 8 minutes. Stir well and serve.
title: Gluten Free Rice Chicken Stuffing
